name: Arcane Forge
description:
Very WIP

Current Version: 0.1.4

Version Fixes:

  • Fixed duplication of certain parts
  • Fixed help text going off the screen
  • Fixed part names not being correct

Current Features:

  • Ability to craft and display weapons
    • Heat ingots in the forge then form the parts on the anvil
    • Cool parts in the water trough and put them in on the table to craft weapons

Next Version Features (V0.2)

  • New crafting materials
  • Ranged weapons
  • Economy system
    • NPC orders to fulfil
    • Ingots cost money to buy
  • Saving and loading
  • Playable adventurer that can be equipped and sent into dungeons to get unique parts and loot
